attributes.action: Free use of parking areas and drop-off and pick-up zones at airports for taxi's
attributes.additional_details: All taxis have the right to use airport areas without paying. Just like buses and trains. We also provide the same service. Airport transfers. And pick-ups. Keep an eye on illegal transporters. Taxi drivers try to survive with competition from unlicensed people who are dedicated to taking people to airports.
attributes.background: Free use of parking areas and drop-off and pick-up zones at airports for any taxi drivers from any county.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about airport parking areas, drop-off and pick-up zones are a matter for airport authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
